name: shield-embedded-web-extension
description: An embedded web extension shield study

scripts.watch: onchange 'addon/**' 'package.json' 'template/**' -e addon/install.rdf -e addon/chrome.manifest -e addon/StudyUtils.jsm -- npm run build -- '{{event}} {{changed}} $(date)'

author: Gregg Lind <glind@mozilla.com>

addon.name: Shield Bootstrap Example
addon.creator: Gregg Lind <glind@mozilla.com>
addon.description: Shield Intrumented Example As Embedded WebExtension
